kubejs.ponder.intro.text_1: Welcome to your newly aquired automaton!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_10: The new brass actuator legs will allow the automaton to jump mid air twice! 100% more than last years model!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_2: Our new models can help you achieve your dreams!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_3: The following are important features you should learn before embaking on your exciting new extra terastrial activity!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_5: The automaton has powerful arms that can break any block!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_6: The automaton does not eat, does not sleep, and does not break! (terms may apply, no warranty)
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_7: The automaton can anylise blocks and devices using the patented JADE system!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_8: The automaton index is used to lookup device interactions and machine processes!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_9: The pattented SUMMERY system is used to provide concise, research based, up to date information about anything you may desire! (unless research was not done and submitted to our network*)
